BackupJob(int, string, string, string, BackupType)

Initializes a new instance of the BackupJob class with an ID.

[JsonConstructor]
public BackupJob(int id, string name, string sourceDirectory, string targetDirectory, BackupType type)

Parameters

id int

Unique identifier for the backup job. Cannot be negative.

name string

Name of the backup job.

sourceDirectory string

Source directory to backup.

targetDirectory string

Target directory for backup storage.

type BackupType

Type of backup.

Methods

OnProgressChanged() 

protected virtual void OnProgressChanged()

StartBackup()

Starts the backup process. Mirrors the folder structure, selects files to backup, and transfers them. Logs the progress and state of the backup job.

public void StartBackup()
